Class Ball

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
csta.ibm.pong.GameObject
Ball
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class Ball
extends GameObject
Ball class defines the characteristics and behavior of the ball game object. The ball object changes direction and interacts with paddle and different types of bricks removes brick and retrieves special abilities
Author:
jeongseon-u
See Also:
